name: Limit Characters in Title
author: Isa?as Oliveira

sections.description:
• Limit the number of characters in Title.

  • Very useful to limit characters in the title and may also set or not inserting an ellipsis (…) at the end of the title.

  • This plugin only limits the number of characters and stops the process the current long title of the publication.

License

This file is part of Limit Characters in Title.

Limit Characters in Title is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with Limit Characters in Title. If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses/.
sections.installation:
• Upload the plugin to the wp-content/plugins folder via FTP or use the default installer Plugins -> Add New and then click the Send tab.

  • Activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
So how do I limit characters in the title?

  • To limit characters in the title of your post or page, type in the “Number of characters” the value of your choice.

  • In option “ellipsis (…)”, you can choose whether or not the ellipsis at the end of the title.
sections.changelog:
1.2.1

  • Input fields (number) Number of characters.

  • Radio Button in opição Ellipsis (…).

screenshots.caption: Editor with postbox character limit in the title.
PostBox with entry (number) "Number of Characters" and Radio button "ellipsis (...)", with insertion option or not the ellipses.
